q11.question: When happened when Franco swims to the island?
q11.recall: When Franco swims to the island, he is abducted by a spy named Ciccio.
q11.vectordb: When Franco swims to the island, he is abducted by a spy called Ciccio, who is a minor agent of Spectralis. Ciccio believes that Franco has vital information about a missing nuclear bomb. Franco eventually escapes and meets a beautiful woman named Cinzia, who is actually an agent for Dr. Yes. Franco and Ciccio team up to plant a fake atomic bomb, but their plans are thwarted when they are captured by Dr. Yes. However, it is later revealed that the mummy they were trying to revive is actually one of their captors in disguise. In the end, Franco and Ciccio discover the real atomic bomb in their fishing nets and are offered untold riches to avert destruction. The final shot shows Ciccio's fingers stroking the button that could trigger a nuclear catastrophe.
q11.hybrid: When Franco swims to the island, he is abducted by a spy named Ciccio.
